bibl.title: Egypt From Alexander to the Copts. An Archaeological and Historical Guide.
bibl.note: 1 front., tabl., nombr. figg., cartes, plans et pll. n./bl. et coul.

Contributions by 12 authors. - 1. General introduction. - 2. Alexandria, the Delta and northern Sinaï. - 3. The Memphite region. - 4. Christian monasticism and pilgrimage in northern Egypt. - 5. The Fayyum. - 6. Middle Egypt. - 7. The Theban region. - 8. Upper Egypt. - 9. The western oases. - 10. The Eastern Desert. - Chronological outline. Bibliography. Index. - A paru conjointement aux États-Unis sous le titre: Egypt From Alexander to the Early Christians. An Archaeological and Historical Guide, Los Angeles, CA, J. Paul Getty Museum, 2004 [2005]. ISBN 0-89236-796-2. $59.95.
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S. and Dominic W. RATHBONE (Edd.), Egypt From Alexander to the Copts. An Archaeological and Historical Guide.
London, The British Museum Press, 2004, 8°, 319 pp., 1 front., tabl., nombr. figg., cartes, plans et pll. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 0-7141-1952-0. £ 29.95.

Contributions by 12 authors. - 1. General introduction. - 2. Alexandria, the Delta and northern Sinaï. - 3. The Memphite region. - 4. Christian monasticism and pilgrimage in northern Egypt. - 5. The Fayyum. - 6. Middle Egypt. - 7. The Theban region. - 8. Upper Egypt. - 9. The western oases. - 10. The Eastern Desert. - Chronological outline. Bibliography. Index. - A paru conjointement aux États-Unis sous le titre: Egypt From Alexander to the Early Christians. An Archaeological and Historical Guide, Los Angeles, CA, J. Paul Getty Museum, 2004 [2005]. ISBN 0-89236-796-2. $59.95.

C.R. par Bruno Rochette, BibO 63 (2006) coll. 90-92. - Kai Ruffing, MBAH 24 (2005) No. 2, pp. 250-251. - Kveta Smolarikova, AO 74 (2006) pp. 370-371. - John Whitehorne, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2005/2005-11-06.html >. - R. James Cook, JRA 20 (2007) pp. 658-660 (éd. amér.). - Georges Nachtergael, ChrEg 82 (2007) Nos 163-164, pp. 363-364 (éd. angl.). - J. Murphy-O'Connor, RBibl 114 (2007) pp. 297-299. - David Frankfurter, JNES 67 (2008) pp. 313-314.
